Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery Ionian cup with everted rim; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; added red band at top of rim above part of lotus flower and bud in added white outline with red centres; exterior: lip black with white myrtle pattern; line at top of reserved handle zone; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding Ionian cups with myrtle wreaths, see British Museum 1888,0601.271 and 1924,1201.1280, both are from Naukratis.
This piece has a lower lip than the otherwise similar 1965,0930.400 etc.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1913) (phase 2)
